com.github.rholder.retry

Class AttemptTimeLimiters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rholder.retry.AttemptTimeLimiters

  • public class AttemptTimeLimiters
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class for instances of AttemptTimeLimiter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <V> AttemptTimeLimiter<V> fixedTimeLimit(long duration, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
      For control over thread management, it is preferable to offer an ExecutorService through the other factory method, fixedTimeLimit(long, TimeUnit, ExecutorService).
      static <V> AttemptTimeLimiter<V> fixedTimeLimit(long duration, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)

    • Method Detail

      • noTimeLimit

        public static <V> AttemptTimeLimiter<V> noTimeLimit()
        Returns:
        an AttemptTimeLimiter impl which has no time limit

      • fixedTimeLimit

        public static <V> AttemptTimeLimiter<V> fixedTimeLimit(long duration,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        For control over thread management, it is preferable to offer an ExecutorService through the other factory method, fixedTimeLimit(long, TimeUnit, ExecutorService). See the note on SimpleTimeLimiter.SimpleTimeLimiter(ExecutorService), which this AttemptTimeLimiter uses.
        Parameters:
        duration - that an attempt may persist before being circumvented
        timeUnit - of the 'duration' arg
        Returns:
        an AttemptTimeLimiter with a fixed time limit for each attempt

      • fixedTimeLimit

        public static <V> AttemptTimeLimiter<V> fixedTimeLimit(long duration,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)
        Parameters:
        duration - that an attempt may persist before being circumvented
        timeUnit - of the 'duration' arg
        executorService - used to enforce time limit
        Returns:
        an AttemptTimeLimiter with a fixed time limit for each attempt
